input.description:

Example: BCAN

String Value - Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully.
Valid values: 0-success,1-failure

String Value - Verbose success status message
Example: The retrieval of Task data has completed successfully for TAS0000000001

call-process.process-name: :Closed_Loop-SA-Change_Management:Utilities:Translate Task Enumerated Values to Target Values

documentation.description: This workflow updates an existing task.
